sentences.en: A few moments later they were airborne and winging their way south.
sentences.cn: 过了一会儿，他们已然搭上飞机赶往南方了。

sentences.en: Do not leave your seat until the plane is airborne.
sentences.cn: 飞机升空时不要离开座位。

sentences.en: He was bundled in and arrested as soon as he was airborne.
sentences.cn: 飞机一起飞他就被强行逮捕了。

sentences.en: Helicopters can to some extent take the place of tanks by spearheading the airborne attack.
sentences.cn: 直升机可以担任空中进攻的前锋，从而在某种程度上取代坦克的地位。

sentences.en: Many people are allergic to airborne pollutants such as pollen.
sentences.cn: 许多人对空气传播的污染物过敏，比如花粉。

sentences.en: Michael Hughes of Lackawanna, Pennsylvania, enlisted in the 82nd Airborne 20 years ago.
sentences.cn: 来自宾夕法尼亚州拉克万纳的迈克尔·休斯20年前参军，在第82空降师服役。

sentences.en: Our plane has lifted off the runway and is now airborne.
sentences.cn: 我们的飞机已经离开跑道,在空中飞行.

sentences.en: The albatross can stay airborne at sea for days at a time.
sentences.cn: 信天翁在海上可以一连在空中待几天.

sentences.en: The allies landed thousands of airborne troops.
sentences.cn: 盟军空投了数千人的空降部队。

sentences.en: The commando force joined up with the airborne troops near the captured bridge.
sentences.cn: 在被占领的桥梁附近,突击队和空降部队会合.

sentences.en: The invading force, conscious of their numerical inferiority at sea, decided on an airborne attack.
sentences.cn: 侵略军考虑到自己的海上兵力处于劣势, 决定采取空降袭击.

sentences.en: The old plane had great difficulty getting airborne.
The pilot did manage to get airborne.
sentences.cn: 飞行员的确设法使飞机升空了。

sentences.en: Then the airplane is airborne, the air hostess will start to feed you.
sentences.cn: 飞机升入空中后，女服务员们开始送上吃的东西。

sentences.en: This concentration of airborne firepower wrought havoc with the enemy forces.
sentences.cn: 这次机载火力的集中攻击给敌军造成很大破坏.

words.tran_cn: [航]空运的；空气传播的；风媒的

phrases.tran_cn: 航空粉尘计数器；空气粒子计数器
机载仪器平台；机载平台

trans.tran_cn: 升空的，飞行中的，空气传播的，空降的，在空气中的
trans.tran_en: airborne soldiers are trained to fight in areas that they get to by jumping out of a plane
